name: AreYouSmarterThanAMatchmaker
0:
”Alexa, start Are You Smarter Than A Matchmaker”
”Alexa, open Are You Smarter Than A Matchmaker”
”Alexa, launch Are You Smarter Than A Matchmaker”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: are you smarter than a matchmaker
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Do you have the knowledge of a modern-day Matchmaker? Whether you want to test your knowledge or just want to have fun, Are You Smarter Than a Matchmaker by Three Day Rule is a trivia game with 50 questions on dating and romance developed by Three Day Rule.

Three Day Rule is the leading in-person personalized matchmaking company with a team of world-class matchmakers and dating experts. 

- To start, just say "Alexa, start Are You Smarter Than A Matchmaker" or "Alexa, open Are You Smarter Than A Matchmaker" to start the game. At anytime, you can stop the game by saying "Alexa, stop"." 

- Alexa will ask you a total of 10 open-ended questions, and you will give the correct answer by saying "The answer is {your answer}." You get one point for each correct answer, and your total score will be given to you after each set of 10 questions. 

- See if you can get each set of 10 questions right, with 5 rounds total that makes 50 challenging questions for you to see if you truly Are Smarter Than A Matchmaker!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
